query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_vmstat_pswpout' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName) | sort by hostname, TimeGenerated asc | extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(hostname) != hostname, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated)) | extend PrevVal = prev(Val) | where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) | extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) | extend pswpout_irate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / DeltaTime, (Val - PrevVal) / DeltaTime) | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_vmstat_pswpin' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName) | sort by hostname, TimeGenerated asc | extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(hostname) != hostname, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated)) | extend PrevVal = prev(Val) | where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated) | extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated) | extend pswpin_irate = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val / DeltaTime, (Val - PrevVal) / DeltaTime)) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, hostname | extend PagingRate = pswpout_irate + pswpin_irate
